Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Belmont
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line  trains are standing at Belmont due to sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line  trains are standing at Belmont due to sick customer.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#36 Broadway

#77 Belmont

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
